name: CVE-2022-26124
description: Improper buffer restrictions in BIOS firmware for some Intel(R) NUC Boards, Intel(R) NUC 8 Boards, Intel(R) NUC 8 Rugged Boards and Intel(R) NUC 8 Rugged Kits before version CHAPLCEL.0059 may allow a privileged user to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access.
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:nuc_8_rugged_kit_nuc8cchkrn_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:intel:nuc_8_rugged_kit_nuc8cchkrn:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:nuc_8_rugged_kit_nuc8cchkr_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:intel:nuc_8_rugged_kit_nuc8cchkr:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:nuc_8_rugged_board_nuc8cchbn_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:intel:nuc_8_rugged_board_nuc8cchbn:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:nuc_board_nuc8cchb_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:intel:nuc_board_nuc8cchb:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*'))]

external_references.description: This object was created using cve2stix from the Signals Corps.
